=MX23 Repositories=


1. Should have gpg created, if not:

	gpg --full
_follow along_

2. Get and install  the MX23 gpg key archive:

	curl -O https://mxrepo.com/mx/repo/pool/main/m/mx23-archive-keyring/mx23-archive-keyring_2023.6.6_all.deb
	sudo dpkg -i mx23-archive-keyring_2023.6.6_all.deb

3. Add the repository list to the existing ones by:

sudo touch /etc/apt/sources.list.d/mx.list
sudo vim /etc/apt/sources.list.d/mx.list

4. Add the following to your new file:

# MX Community Main and Test Repos
deb http://mxrepo.com/mx/repo/ bookworm main non-free
#deb http://mxrepo.com/mx/testrepo/ bookworm test

#ahs hardware stack repo
deb http://mxrepo.com/mx/repo/ bookworm ahs

5. Update Your System:


	sudo apt update && sudo apt upgrade -y

6. Install Anything you like!!!


CAUTION
=======

In case of most Operating Systems other then the obvious MX and possibly few exeptions of debian based distros, this is most likely to brake your system or cause other inconviniences
